title: Xiaomi's SU7 bedazzles at India showcasing, rolls out tech bonanza with  star-Redmi 13 5G
description: Chinese tech giant Xiaomi showcased its electric vehicle SU7 in Bengaluru, alongside new electronic products like the Star-Redmi 13 5G. Although not for sale in India, the SU7, resembling a Porsche Taycan but cheaper, marks Xiaomiâ€™s EV ambitions. Heavy rains in Muradabad have damaged tomato crops, driving prices up in North India.
